backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and numerous user, subscription, posting, marketplace, and payment-related types plus state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend source files, their roles, and key behaviors.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Specifies asset caching rules and security-related HTTP headers for frontend deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global CSS variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading React root container and Google Analytics tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing global state, sections, navigation, authentication, and feature modules.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Authentication dialog with sign‑in/up tabs, Google login button, and success confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Reusable Google-branded button that triggers Internet Identity login with loading state.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides Google-branded Internet Identity sign‑in/sign‑out UI with error handling and a dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows development‑only warnings for failed canister connections or missing backend IDs with dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Float: Floating button that appears after scrolling and scrolls smoothly to the top anchor.
Floating action button that scrolls to the wish‑creation section.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Top‑edge progress bar reflecting scroll position with reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Stick: Sticky responsive navbar with active‑section highlighting and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating Free, Pro, or Creator plan with appropriate styling and icons.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animates children into view when scrolled into viewport with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: React Query hooks fetching authenticated user download history, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/features/admin/AccessDenied: Card UI indicating insufficient admin permissions for accessing the panel.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPayment: Admin UI to view, filter, and approve or reject manual payment requests with tabs and status updates.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAll: Fetches all payment requests from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useIsA: Checks if the logged‑in user is an admin and exposes loading and fetched state.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useUpd: Mutation hook to approve or reject payment requests and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Upserts a user auth record after login to create or update last-login metadata.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Canvas utility functions for drawing visual effects like vignette, glow text, shadows, sparkles, and confetti.
Generates a full card image by drawing background, text, themes, and visual effects onto a canvas.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardTex: Sanitizes and formats card text, removing placeholders and building title, message, and footer content.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardThe: Defines premium card theme configurations and provides lookup helpers for theme data.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/compone: Carousel component that displays and navigates between card image variations using touch, keyboard, and buttons.
Canvas-based confetti animation triggered after card generation, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/enhance: Applies post-processing effects like contrast, vignette, and sharpening to a rendered canvas.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/fitText: Utilities for fitting text into canvas bounds by adjusting font size, line height, and computing safe regions.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/generat: Provides predefined non-text variation parameters and returns the number of card design variations.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image with cross-origin support for canvas rendering.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF window for birthday packs with optional watermark.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/shortWi: Converts arbitrary wish text into a 15–20 word card-safe message with cleanup, trimming, and expansion logic.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Provides standard and emoji-aware text wrapping functions for canvas rendering.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a community post preview card with title, description, creator info, and follow/view actions using authentication and follow state hooks.
Shows a detailed modal view of a community post with full description, metadata, and an option to follow the creator.
Provides a dialog form for authenticated users to create a community post with title, type, and description.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks to fetch all community posts or a specific post from the backend actor.
Mutation hook to create a new community post, handling cache invalidation and error toasts.
Manages following creators via local storage and backend subscription, exposing hooks for follow actions and checking follow status.
frontend/src/features/examples/component: Renders a styled example wish card with themed visuals, emoji decorations, and variation controls.
frontend/src/features/examples/exampleWi: Maps relationships and tones to emoji sets and provides helpers to decorate wish titles and bodies with emojis.
Formats a SampleWish into a short birthday title and a trimmed 1–2 sentence body with length and punctuation rules.
Maps wishes to visual style tags using explicit or tone‑based lookup logic.
Generates seeded typography and background themes for wishes and combines them into card themes.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines SampleWish and provides preset example wishes with tones, relationships, and style tags.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Lists selectable relationships, tones, languages, and personalities for the generator form.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a single text block with labeled sections.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Builds a full BirthdayPack by generating main wish, short messages, captions, speech, and hashtags using language phrases.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides English, Hindi, and Hinglish phrase sets and selects the correct pack by language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Creates randomized GeneratorFormData values using predefined option lists and sample names.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines generator-related types including relationships, tones, languages, personalities, form data, and pack structure.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: UI dialog for creating marketplace listings with authentication, entitlement checks, form handling, and submission logic.
Displays a marketplace listing card with metadata, seller info, price, and a button that opens a request-to-buy dialog.
Dialog allowing buyers to send a prefilled message to sellers, copy or WhatsApp it, and record interest via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: Mutation hook to create new marketplace listings and refresh listing data, with error handling for auth issues.
Mutation hook that records buyer interest in a listing and refreshes listing data on success.
Query hook that retrieves authenticated users’ interaction counts for a listing from the backend.
Query hooks to fetch all marketplace listings or a single listing by ID when an actor is available.
frontend/src/features/payments/hooks/use: Mutation hook to submit manual UPI payment requests with optional screenshot uploads and refresh related queries.
Query hook fetching the authenticated user’s past payment requests from the backend.
frontend/src/features/payments/manualUpi: Defines static UPI payment constants like UPI ID, payee name, and QR image path.
UI step showing UPI payment instructions, QR code, and actions to copy UPI ID or open UPI apps.
Provides localStorage helpers for saving and retrieving the user’s payment email.
Form for submitting payment request details including email, UTR, and optional screenshot upload.
Generates a UPI deep link URL using plan details and encoded metadata.
Disables Razorpay and returns a stub upgrade handler since manual UPI flow is active.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of placeholder cards showing upcoming premium features with icons and descriptions.
Provides UI controls for adjusting card background, typography, colors, alignment, decorations, and uploading a photo.
Implements download, sharing, and text-copy actions for exporting premium cards in different formats.
Manages the full premium card designer flow, including theme selection, customization, preview, and export actions.
Renders a live preview of the designed card applying selected theme, styles, animations, emojis, and optional photo.
Defines the available premium themes and provides a helper to fetch a theme by ID.
Declares shared types for themes, designer state, styling options, and photo placement.
Custom hook managing the premium designer's state and setters for all customization options.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Manages daily message quota in localStorage, resetting counts per day and providing functions to read, increment, and compute remaining quota.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: Computes remaining message quota using backend for authenticated users or localStorage for anonymous users, and provides a mutation to record message usage.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata and entitlements for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers, with helpers to retrieve plan info.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: Displays an overlay locking premium features and triggers the pricing modal when users attempt to unlock them.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Implements a multi‑step pricing and payment flow modal, including plan comparison, payment steps, and status handling for upgrades.
Renders a feature comparison table for Free, Pro, and Creator plans using predefined plan features.
frontend/src/features/subscription/UPGRA: Provides a detailed manual QA checklist for testing upgrade buttons, pricing modal flow, and Razorpay payment behavior.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: Fetches subscription status for authenticated users to determine effective plan and return its entitlements.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: Returns subscription status from backend with refresh capability and state flags for authenticated users.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: React view that fetches a surprise payload, triggers confetti, reveals text with delays, and manages looping background music.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: React Query hooks to create surprise links and fetch surprise payloads via the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Maps template IDs to Tailwind class strings and returns combined base and template styling.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Registry of static background image paths with a helper to resolve image keys.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines template metadata including icons, gradients, and background image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Scroll‑spy hook using IntersectionObserver to track the currently visible section ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that reports when a referenced element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Stores and retrieves a user’s selected plan in localStorage, scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Tracks system-level reduced‑motion preference using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Computes page scroll progress from 0 to 1 using requestAnimationFrame for smooth updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to validate the authenticated principal, returning null for anonymous users.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH color variables for light/dark mode, utility classes, and gradient animation.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides a copy-to-clipboard helper with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings or readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens principal IDs by truncating the middle with an ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Implements smooth scrolling to anchors with sticky-header offset and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a shareable WhatsApp link with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community feed with tabs, post creation, filtering, and post detail dialogs.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Displays subscription status, message quota, and admin panels in a dashboard layout.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Shows example wishes with tone filtering and allows applying styles to the generator form.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders an FAQ list using accordion components with styled headings and layout.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, legal links, and a dynamic year plus a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the birthday wish generator form with validation, quota checks, randomization, and triggering generation using app context.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the landing hero section with branding, social proof, auth prompts, and buttons to start generating or try the demo.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Provides styled sections for Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy using card components and Reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Shows the marketplace with filters, search, listing cards, and a dialog for creating listings, fetching data via marketplace hooks.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Displays generated birthday outputs, supports copying, sharing, exporting cards, and generating themed card variations with confetti effects.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: React section rendering pricing plans with cards, highlighting the Pro plan and providing upgrade actions via context.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Template selection UI showing multiple card templates, allowing users to pick one and view a live preview.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Razorpay options, responses, instance methods, and global window typing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, shadows, animations, and theme settings for the project.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, path aliasing, build options, and a dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Project state metadata summarizing features, architecture notes, issues, and current version tracking.
